mapper.update: UPDATE rReply SET replyText = #{replyText}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rReply (boardId, userId, replyText) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{replyText})
mapper.select: SELECT rr.id, rr.boardId, rr.userId, rr.replyText, rr.inserted, rr.updated, up.name FROM rReply rr left JOIN User up ON rr.userId = up.id JOIN ResellBoard rb ON rr.boardId = rb.id WHERE rr.boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY id DESC
